titleStmt.title: Judgement & mercy for afflicted soules, or, Meditations, soliloquies, and prayers by Fra. Quarles.
Boanerges and Barnabas
titleStmt.author: Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ric. Cotes for Richard Royston ...,

notesStmt.note: First ed. of this part; pt. [2] was previously published as: Judgement and mercie for afflicted souls. Cambridge : R. Daniel, 1646. An unauthorized ed. of pt. [2] first appeared in 1644 as: Barnabas and Boanerges. The two parts were later published together as: Boanerges and Barnabas.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
